subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Julius Erving, known as Dr. J, was a basketball legend in the A.B.A. and then the N.B.A. when the leagues merged in 1976. A new documentary about his life, called “The Doctor,” will air on NBA TV.
snippet: Julius Erving, known as Dr. J, was a basketball legend in the A.B.A. and then the N.B.A. when the leagues merged in 1976. A new documentary about his life, called “The Doctor,” will air on NBA TV.
